mapper.select: SELECT vac_type.VAC_TYPE_NO, vac_type.VAC_TYPE_NAME, cm.CM_NM AS VAC_TYPE_EXP, vac_type.VH_INFO, vac_type.vac_type_use_date, SUM(vh_give_days) - vaap_days AS totalDays, vac_type.img_Root FROM vac_type LEFT JOIN ( SELECT VH_CNG_NO, VH_DAYCNT, EMP_NO, VH_GIVE_DATE, VAC_TYPE_NO, VH_GIVE_DAYS, VH_FIX_DAYS FROM vac_hold vh WHERE vh.vac_type_no = '1' AND vh.emp_no = #{empNo} and to_char(vh_give_date,'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') ) t1 ON vac_type.VAC_TYPE_NO = t1.VAC_TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT emp_no, SUM(vaap_days) AS vaap_days FROM vac_apply GROUP BY emp_no ) t2 ON t1.EMP_NO = t2.emp_no LEFT JOIN cmcode cm ON vac_type.VAC_TYPE_EXP = cm.CM_code GROUP BY vac_type.VAC_TYPE_NO, vac_type.VAC_TYPE_Name, cm.CM_NM, vac_type.VH_INFO, vac_type.vac_type_use_date, vaap_days, vac_type.img_Root ORDER BY vac_type_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VAC_APPLY (VAAP_CODE,VAAP_EMP, VAAP_DAYS, VAAP_START, VAAP_END, VAAP_TYPE, VAAP_RSN, EMP_NO, VH_CNG_NO, VAC_TYPE_NO, VAAP_DATE ,VAC_TYPE_NAME, VAC_TYPE_USE_DATE,VAAP_APST_CODE) VALUES (vac_seq.nextval,(select EMP_NM from EMP where EMP_NO = #{empNo}), #{vaapDays} ,#{vaapStart}, #{vaapEnd}, #{vaapType}, #{vaapRsn}, #{empNo}, #{vhCngNo}, #{vacTypeNo}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ,(SELECT CM_NM FROM CMCODE WHERE CM_GROUP = 'vacation' AND CM_OTPT_SN = #{vacTypeNo}) ,(SELECT VAC_TYPE_USE_DATE FROM VAC_TYPE WHERE VAC_TYPE_NO = #{vacTypeNo}) ,'C0104')

SELECT vac_seq.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO VAC_APPLY (VAAP_CODE,VAAP_EMP, VAAP_DAYS, VAAP_START, VAAP_END, VAAP_TYPE, VAAP_RSN, EMP_NO, VAC_TYPE_NO, VAAP_DATE ,VAC_TYPE_NAME, VAC_TYPE_USE_DATE,VAAP_APST_CODE,DFT_NO) VALUES (#{vaapCode},(select EMP_NM from EMP where emp_No = #{empNo}), #{vaapDays} ,#{vaapStart}, #{vaapEnd}, #{vaapType}, #{vaapRsn}, #{empNo}, #{vacTypeNo}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ,(SELECT CM_NM FROM CMCODE WHERE CM_GROUP = 'vacation' AND CM_OTPT_SN = #{vacTypeNo}) ,(SELECT VAC_TYPE_USE_DATE FROM VAC_TYPE WHERE VAC_TYPE_NO = #{vacTypeNo}) ,'C0104',(select DFT_NO from VACATIONFORM WHERE vaap_code = #{vaapCode}))
mapper.select: SELECT va.VAAP_CODE, va.EMP_NO, va.VAC_TYPE_NO, va.VAAP_DAYS, va.VAAP_RSN, (select CM_NM FROM CMCODE WHERE CM_CODE = VA.VAAP_APST_CODE) VAAP_APST_CODE , va.VAAP_RT_RS, va.VAAP_CC_ST, to_char(va.VAAP_START,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS VAAP_START, to_char(va.VAAP_END,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS VAAP_END, va.VAAP_TYPE, (SELECT VT.VAC_TYPE_NAME FROM VAC_TYPE VT WHERE VT.VAC_TYPE_NO = VA.VAC_TYPE_NO) VAC_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT VT.VAC_TYPE_USE_DATE FROM VAC_TYPE VT WHERE VT.VAC_TYPE_NO = VA.VAC_TYPE_NO) VAC_TYPE_USE_DATE FROM vac_apply VA WHERE va.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE vac_apply X SET X.VAAP_APST_CODE = 'C0102' WHERE X.VAAP_CODE IN ( SELECT DISTINCT VA.VAAP_CODE FROM vac_apply VA, VACATIONFORM T, apbox A WHERE T.VAAP_CODE = VA.VAAP_CODE AND VA.DFT_NO = A.DFT_NO AND A.APB_PRO NOT IN('진행중','반려') AND va.EMP_NO = #{empNo} )

UPDATE vac_apply X SET X.VAAP_APST_CODE = 'C0103' WHERE X.VAAP_CODE IN ( SELECT DISTINCT VA.VAAP_CODE FROM vac_apply VA, VACATIONFORM T, apbox A WHERE T.VAAP_CODE = VA.VAAP_CODE AND VA.DFT_NO = A.DFT_NO AND A.APB_PRO NOT IN('진행중','승인') AND va.EMP_NO = #{empNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT va.VAAP_CODE, va.EMP_NO, va.VAC_TYPE_NO, va.VAAP_DAYS, va.VAAP_RSN, va.VAAP_APST_CODE, va.VAAP_RT_RS, va.VAAP_CC_ST, to_char(va.VAAP_START,'yyyy-MM-dd') VAAP_START, to_char(va.VAAP_END,'yyyy-MM-dd') VAAP_END, va.VAAP_TYPE, vt.VAC_TYPE_NAME, vt.VH_INFO, vt.VAC_TYPE_USE_DATE , (select sum(vh_give_days) as days from VAC_hold where emp_no=#{empNo} and to_char(vh_give_date, 'YYYY') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY'))- (select sum(vaap_days) as TOTALDAYS2 FROM vac_apply where emp_no=#{empNo} and to_char(vaap_date, 'YYYY') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY')) TOTALDAYS2 FROM vac_apply VA INNER JOIN VAC_TYPE vt ON va.VAC_TYPE_NO = vt.VAC_TYPE_NO WHERE va.VAAP_CODE = #{vaapCode} ORDER BY VAAP_CODE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE vac_apply SET VH_CNG_NO = #{vhCngNo}, VAAP_DAYS = #{vaapDays}, VAAP_RSN = #{vaapRsn}, VAAP_APST_CODE = #{vaapApstCode}, VAAP_START = #{vaapStart}, VAAP_END = #{vaapEnd}, VAAP_TYPE = #{vaapType} WHERE VAAP_CODE = #{vaapCode}

select ap.EMP_no,ap.dft_no,ap.apb_pro, ap.SERIAL_NUMBER,e.emp_NM, FN_GET_CM_NM(ptn_code) as ptnCode, e.SIGN_FILE_NO, ap.REJ_RSN, (SELECT DISTINCT SVFI_NAME FROM FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_UDTER = e.EMP_NO AND FILE_SN = (SELECT MAX(FILE_SN) FROM FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_SETTING = 'temp' AND FILE_UDTER = e.EMP_NO))AS SIGN_IMG from apbox ap inner join emp e on ap.emp_no = e.emp_no where dft_no=#{dftNo}
